1277:3: śāstramāha-trividhacittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyaṃ yaduta prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittam|
1277:11: (u) skandhānupādāya ye vikalpā tadyathā pañcaskandhānupādāya puruṣa ityucyate|
1277:16: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ|| iti|
1277:17: yathā ca bhagavān bhikṣūnavocat-dharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ pratītyasamutpannā aniyatasvabhāvā nāmamātramanusmaraṇamātraṃ bhogamātram|
1277:18: imāneva pañcaskandhānupādāya nānā nāma pravartate sattvo manuṣyo deva ityādi iti|
1277:30: buddhā bhagavanto laukikānāṃ prajñaptito viyojanāya lokasatyena vyavaharanti|
1277:34: purā kila janā vastūpabhogakāmanayā vahuvastunāmutpattikāle ghaṭa ityādi nāma sthāpayāñcakruḥ|
1277:41: na patati mithyādṛṣṭau sukhānte duḥkhānte ca|
1277:45: anena dharmeṇa taccittaṃ damayitvā mārgaśāsanaṃ grāhayitvā paścātparamārthasatyamupadiśati|
1277:48: yo mārgasya lābhajñānaṃ sādhayati [sa] paramārthadharmopadeśārho bhavati|
1277:49: yathā bhagavata evaṃ cetaḥ parivitarka udabhut-paripavkāḥ khalu rāhulasya [bhikṣoḥ] vimuktiparipacanīyā dharmāḥ yannūnamahaṃ rāhulaṃ uttara āsravānāṃ kṣaye vinayeyamiti|
1277:50: tadyathā ghrāṇapākaḥ tadvināśe sukhaṃ janane durbhedanam|
1277:51: evaṃ lokasatyena cittaṃ damayitvā'tha paramārthajñānena vināśayati|
1277:53: yogī pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ [kiṃ] prajñaptisantaḥ [kiṃ vā] paramārthasanta iti jñātvā paścānnirodhasatyaṃ sākṣātkaroti|
1277:65: yathoktaṃ sūtre-lokasamudayaṃ paśyataḥ nāstīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati|
1277:66: lokanirodhaṃ paśyataḥ astīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati iti|
1277:68: lokasatyato bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ satyameva yaduta astyātmā nāstyātmā ityādi paryāyāḥ|
1277:73: asti vastutaḥ sattva iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ ayaṃ mahāmohaḥ|
1277:81: jananamaraṇavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti vacanaṃ hi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ|
1277:82: yadi śūnyatābuddhipratilābhī vadati nāsti sattva iti|
1277:85: kiṃ nu sattva iti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te|
1277:91: duḥkhaṃ śūnyo nirātmā ca jātivyayavināśanaḥ|| iti|
1277:94: (u) yasya puruṣasya śūnyatātattvajñānaṃ notpannaṃ tasyāstyātmeti matirbhavati|
1277:96: yathāha bhagavān-ye bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyo nāstyātmā,
1277:97: na punaḥ karoti iti śrutavantaḥ te mahābhītā bhavanti|
1277:99: ato jñāyate apratilabdhaśūnyatājñānaḥ astyātmeti matyā nirvāṇādbibheti|
1277:103: apratilabdhaśūnyatātattvo nāsti kiñcanetidṛ ṣṭyā durgatau patati yadutocchedadṛṣṭi[rūpa]mithyādṛṣṭiḥ|
1277:104: yo'yaṃ lokasatyato'styātmeti prajñāya asti karmaphalamiti śraddadhānaḥ paścāt saṃskārā anityā utpattinirodhalakṣaṇā iti bhāvayitvā nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti|
1277:106: sa yadi nāsti kiñcaneti vacanaṃ śṛṇoti|
1277:109: kecittīrthikā apavadanti śramaṇo gautamaḥ paramārthata ātmānaṃ dūṣayatīti|
1277:110: ato bhagavānāha- lokasatyato vadāmi asti sattva iti|
1277:111: samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayan vadāmi santi sattvāḥ sandhāvantaḥ saṃsaranta iti|
1277:124: yathā citritaḥ pradīpaḥ pradīpa ityukto'pi na pradipavṛttiko bhavati|
1277:125: evaṃ ghaṭo'stīti kathito'pi na vastusan bhavati|
1277:126: santi pañcaskandhā ityuktā api na paramārthāḥ||
1277:129: (pṛ) kathaṃ ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptitaḥ santi na vastutaḥ|
1277:131: yathā vadanti idaṃ rūpaṃ idaṃ ghaṭarūpamiti|
1277:149: yathā vedanā na vedayate vijānāti ca|
1277:179: manovijñānamapi sattvādau vikṣipati yaduta kāyaḥ sattvaḥ cittaṃ sattva iti|
1277:180: evaṃ rūpādaya eva ghaṭa athavā rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭa ityādi|
1277:181: paramārthavacane tu cittaṃ samādadhāti na vikṣipati|
1277:182: rūpaṃ paśyāmīti [vat] śabdamapi paśyāmīti na vaktuṃ śakyate|
1277:187: rūpādayo dharmā jñeyādāvanabhidheyā iti na vyapadiśyante|
1277:194: yaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kuśalaṃ karoti sa vidvān|
1277:204: yathāha bhagavān-vidvān mūḍhaśca sarvaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayate|
1277:213: yathāha-[kṣipraṃ] dharmaṃ vijānāti vijño jihvā sūparasaṃ yathā|
1277:226: rūparasagandhasparśānupādāya hi ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ|
1277:228: (13) prajñaptau ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā iti|
1277:229: rūpādiṣu tu na saṃśayo bhavati rūpaṃ vā kiṃ vā śabda iti|
1277:230: (pṛ) rūpādāvapi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti|
1277:232: rūpaṃ paśyan naiva saṃśete ayaṃ śabda iti|
1277:233: anyasmāt kāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti|
1277:234: yathā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti śrutvā punā rūpaṃ paśyan saṃśete kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti|
1277:236: (pṛ) nirodhasatye'pi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti nirodhaḥ kiṃ vā nāsti nirodha iti|
1277:237: (u) abhiniviṣṭeṣu saṃśayo bhavati na tu nirodhasatye|
1277:238: asti nirodha iti mataṃ nāsti nirodha iti matañca yaḥ śṛṇoti tasya bhavati saṃśayaḥ kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti|
1277:241: nirodhasatyaṃ paśyato na punaḥ saṃśayo bhavati|
1277:256: snehadveṣādivikalpo yaḥ kaścana sa sarvaḥ prajñaptisan|
1277:262: dāhyate pradāhyate ityādi yā kācana kriyā sarvā sā prajñaptisatī|
1277:269: prāṇātipātādi pāpaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādi puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ na paramārthasat|
1277:284: tathā śūnyatayā yat khaṇḍanaṃ tattu paramārthasat|
1277:295: anirvacanīyatvam-rūpādaya eva vā ghaṭaḥ kiṃ vā tadvayatirikto ghaṭa iti na nirvaktuṃ śakyate|
1277:302: (u) ekatvavāde doṣo yaduta rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekaṃ vibhaktam|
1277:310: (pṛ) yathā ekaikaṃ tilaṃ na kalāpaṃ sādhayati|
1277:325: ato jñāyate rūpādaya eva na pṛthivīti|
1277:326: laukikā vadanti-pṛthivīrūpaṃ pṛthivīgandhaḥ pṛthivīrasaḥ pṛthivīsparśaṃ iti|
1277:327: na paśyāmo rūparūpamiti vadantaṃ yaṃ kañcana|
1277:335: tathāpi svātmarūpeṇaiva svātmapradarśanaṃ [iti vadataḥ] ko doṣaḥ|
1277:336: (u) yadyucyate pṛthivī rūpādinā svātmānameva pradarśayatīti nāyaṃ nyāyo bhavati|
1277:340: śilāpuruṣasya hasta iti pradarśane tadanyaḥ kāyaḥ śilāpuruṣa iti syāt|
1277:343: tasmin samaye śilāpuruṣa eva na punastadanyo'stītyucyate|
1277:344: yathā bhagavānāha-santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ityādi|
1277:347: ato jñāyate śilāpuruṣa iti vacanamapi mṛṣāvacanam, iti|
1277:356: rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī iti tu vaktuṃ śakyate|
1277:372: na syāt rūpamātre pṛthivīṃ paśyāmīti pṛthivīsaṃjñā|
1277:377: yathā kaścid vṛkṣaśākhāṃ chindan vadati-vṛkṣaṃ chindāmi,
1277:387: ato jñāyate na sarvāṇi bhautikāni śabdavantīti||
1277:409: ato jñāyate na pṛthak santi pṛthivyādayo dharmā iti|
1277:413: kāyendriyeṇa spṛṣṭvāpi jānīmaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti|
1277:420: na hyandhakāre vivecayati ghaṭo vā jighrayate kapālaṃ vā|
1277:421: ghaṭo vā rasyate kapālaṃ vā iti|
1277:422: (u) yadyapi na vivecayati kiṃ ghaṭa uta kapālamiti|
1277:423: tathāpi mṛdi jñānaṃ bhavati mṛdaṃ jighrāmi,
1277:426: tadā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā vā na nirdhārayati kimayaṃ ghaṭa śarāvaḥ kiṃ vā ghataśakalamiti|
1277:427: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyañca na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt iti|
1277:428: andhakāre ghaṭabuddhirutpannā'pi na vivecayati suvarṇaghaṭo rajataghaṭo vā iti|
1277:429: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyamapi na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt|
1277:432: yathā [cakṣuḥ] puṣpādi paśyati na vivicya jānāti gandhaḥ surabhirasurabhirvā raso madhuro'madhuro vā ityādi|
1277:433: ato yadi mataṃ cakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ jānīmo dravyaṃ na ghrāṇajihvābhyāmiti|
1277:435: yathā ghrāṇajihve dravyaṃ pṛthakkṛtya na vikalpayataḥ|
1277:436: tathā cakṣuḥkāyendriye api dravyamapṛthagbhūtamapi na vikalpayataḥ|
1277:448: na tu sarvo rūpātpṛthagbhūto dharmo dṛśyaḥ|
1277:454: yadi ca dṛśyadharmeṇa tadanyadharma upalabhya dṛśyo bhavati|
1277:462: indriyeṇa rūpaṃ dṛśyamitīdaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ punaralakṣaṇaṃ bhavati|
1277:474: na tatrāsti vinigamanā rūpamātramupalabdhikaraṃ nānye dharmā iti|
1277:482: yathā andho'bhyastaghaṭaparimāṇo vinaṣṭacakṣuṣko'pi spṛṣṭvā ghaṭaṃ jānāti|
1277:486: bhavatāṃ sūtre'pyuktam-kāyāgataspṛṣṭaḥ sparśo na pṛthivyaptejasāṃmiti jñātavyam-adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti|
1277:489: andha imaṃ vāyuṃ jānannapi na jānāti vāyurayaṃ kiṃ dṛśyaḥ kiṃvā adṛśya iti|
1277:498: (u) asmanmate rūpaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo dharmo dṛśyaḥ|
1277:499: ato jñāyate mate['smin] yatra rūpamutpannamasti tatra cakṣuḥ paśyati|
1277:503: ato rūpadi vihāya pṛthagasti ghaṭa itīdaṃ na nyāyyam||
1277:517: yathā cakṣurvijñānena rūpaṃ jñāyate, na śabdādi|
1277:529: ato jñāyate paramārthato nānirvācyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñaptāveva ekatvanānātvasatvāducyate'nirvācya iti||
1277:533: (u) abhāvatve na puṇyapāpādīnāṃ vipāko vimuktyādayaḥ sarve dharmāḥ|
1277:534: vidyamānaṃ nāstīti grahe sa graho'pi abhāvaḥ syāt|
1277:536: asti nāstīti vādāḥ śraddhayoktāḥ pratyakṣajñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti anumitijñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti|
1277:538: yatkiñcana nāstīti yat vacanaṃ tadeṣu triṣu na bhavati|
1277:539: sūtraṃ vānusarāma iti bhavatāmāśayo[yaḥ] nāyaṃ yujyate|
1277:555: sarve dharmā abhāvā iti bhavata āśaye jñānamidaṃ kiṃ pratītya bhavati|
1277:560: tadā sarve janā yathābhipretaṃ yatkiñcana kuryuḥ|
1277:568: yadi kāraṇena na prakāśayati [tadā] paragṛhītaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sidhyet|
1277:570: yo bhāvaḥ kāraṇena sādhyaḥ na so'bhāva ityucyate||
1277:580: avayavinyagrāhye'pi avayavā grāhyā iti bhavato yanmatam|
1277:591: sūkṣmāvayavān paśyato'vayavabuddhiḥ sadā bhavati na ghaṭabuddhiḥ|
1277:620: na hi cakṣuḥ sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati|
1277:621: na ca mano gṛhṇāti pratyutpannaṃ rūpam|
1277:624: manovijñānantu atīte anāgate vartate na rūpe vartate|
1277:653: kiṃ rūpaṃ prāpya paśyati kiṃ vā'prāpya paśyati|
1277:664: (u) yadi cakṣuraprāptamapi jñānagocara ityucyate sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ jñānagocaraḥ syāt|
1277:667: yadi sati pūrvameva cakṣuṣi rūpe ca paścāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate|
1277:680: yadi padārtho nirāyatanaḥ tadā āśritya tiṣṭhatīti na labhyate|
1277:681: yadi bravīṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣo'lpabhāga utpadyate yadi vā vyāpyotpadyate|
1277:688: ekaikavijñānāvayavo na vijānāti avayavī tu vijānāti|
1277:705: ato jñāyate śabdo na śrāvya iti|
1277:710: śabdo'yaṃ prāpya aprāpya vā ubhayathā'pi na śravaṇīyaḥ|
1277:739: pūrvoktavat gandhaḥ prāpto vā aprāpto gṛhyata ityubhayathā'sti doṣaḥ|
1277:743: sūkṣmādyavayaveṣveva sparśajñānaṃ notpadyata iti yathāpūrvaṃ vaktavyam|
1277:749: manovijñānaṃ hi na pratyutpannān rūparasagandhasparśān gṛhṇāti|
1277:752: (pṛ) yadi manovijñānaṃ rūpādīn dharmān na jānāti|
1277:762: (u) yathā kasyacit cittaṃ svātmānamajñātvā'pi cintā bhavati ahaṃ cittavāniti|
1277:774: hetau pūrvaṃ san vā guṇa utpadyeta|
1277:782: ato na hetau pūrvaṃ san guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati|
1277:783: bhavato yadi mataṃ hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayatīti|
1277:787: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu śuklatantuḥ śuklapaṭaṃ sādhayati|
1277:789: yadi hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati|
1277:790: kasmāt śuklatantuḥ śukla[paṭa]meva sādhayati na kṛṣṇam|
1277:791: ato na hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati|
1277:800: (pṛ) dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu ghaṭaṃ kiyamāṇam kathaṃ nāsti ghaṭa iti|
1277:830: hetau niruddhe kena phalamutpadyeta yathā avidyamānaḥ pitā kathaṃ putramutpādayet|
1277:834: yadi hetuḥ phalañca samakālam na tarhi ayaṃ nyāyaḥ|
1277:835: yathā dve śṛṅge yugapadudbhūte nocyete vāmadakṣiṇe'nyonyahetuke|
1277:846: laukikā na paśyanti kañcana dharmaṃ hetuphalayorapṛthagbhāvarūpam|
1277:856: na ca paścāmaḥ kañcana dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ kurvantam|
1277:863: cakṣuṣo rūpasya naivaṃ bhavati-āvāṃ saha vijñānamabhinirvartayāva iti|
1277:875: garbhe'pi bālānāṃ cakṣurādikāyāvayaveṣu kaḥ sacittatvaṃ karoti|
1277:884: dṛṣṭe ca karmakaraṇe citte vikalpayati-evaṃ kartavyaṃ,
1277:894: yat bhavān nānākāraṇairbravīti-sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā iti|
1277:914: tathāgatāḥ paraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāraṃ prakṛtito naissvābhāvyaṃ viśeṣasāmānyalakṣaṇāni sarvāṇi pratividhyanti|
1277:918: (pṛ) yathā bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍagatena dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratilabdham|
1277:923: tadyathā bhagavānupadiśati sarvadharmāḥ pratītya samutpannā iti|
1277:926: vicitrāṅkādīni rūpāṇi nṛttagītādayo nādā gandharasasparśā apramāṇaviśeṣā nopadeśyāḥ|
1277:927: upadeśe'pi nāsti mahaddhitam ityata īdṛśaṃ vastu nopadiśati bhagavān|
1277:929: yathā kaścit citrāṅkanādidharmavikalpamajñātvā vadati tāni na santīti|
1277:930: tathā bhavānapi yatkimapyasādhayitvā vadati nāstīdaṃ-vastu iti|
1277:933: yathā jātyandho vadati nāsti kṛṣṇamavadātaṃ vā,
1277:936: yadyevam, pratītyasiddhatvānna santi sarve dharmā iti vaktuṃ pāryate|
1277:939: ato jñāyate rūpādayaḥ sarvadharmāḥ santi yathā ghaṭādayaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santīti||
1277:946: (u) santi vastutaḥ pañcaskandhā iti cittaṃ dharmacittamityucyate|
1277:947: pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā samyagbhāvayato dharmacittaṃ nirudhyate|
1277:948: (pṛ) yogī paśyati pañcaskandhān śūnyān yaduta pañcaskandheṣu nāsti nityadharmaḥ sthiradharmo'vināśadharmo'vipariṇāmadharma ātmāmīyadharma iti|
1277:960: yathoktaṃ sūtre-yogāvacara idaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati yāvadidaṃ vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ṣaśyati iti|
1277:961: na tu rūpādayaḥ pañcaskandhā na santīti jñātavyam|
1277:964: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogāvacaraḥ paśyati rūpādīn dharmān anityalakṣaṇān vikṣepalakṣaṇān vināśalakṣaṇān māyālakṣaṇān nirvedalakṣaṇān iti|
1277:967: taddarśanaṃ tāvadvayavadānā[tmakam] ato jñāyate pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyatīti|
1277:971: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvatastu na tat punarabhimukhībhabati|
1277:973: tadyathā kaścana vṛkṣaḥ krakacakṛtto bhasmasātkṛtaḥ prakṣīṇaḥ|
1277:981: ato jñāyate yaḥ sattvaparibhedaḥ iyaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatā|
1277:983: bhāvanā ca dvividhā-śūnya[tā-] bhāvanā nairātmyabhāvanā iti|
1277:985: yathā kaścit jalaṃ nāstīti ghaṭa śūnyaṃ paśyati|
1277:986: tathā pañcaskandheṣu pudgalo nāstīti [tān] śūnyān paśyati|
1277:999: paramārthataḥ śūnyamiti vacanam-ayamarthasatyataḥ śūnyo na saṃvṛtisatyata iti|
1277:1000: paramārthaśca yaduta rūpaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam yāvadvijñānaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam|
1277:1001: ato yadrūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ tat paramārthaśūnyatādarśanamityucyate|
1277:1006: tadarthamucyante pañca skandhāḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyā iti|
1277:1007: (pṛ) kiṃ nu khalu sūtre noktam asti karma asti phalam,
1277:1009: (u) ayaṃ hetuḥ dharmaṇāṃ kārakākhyo nopalabhyata itīdaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatābhidhānam|
1277:1011: prajñaptisaṃjñā ca yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjarāmaraṇaduḥkhasamudayanirodho bhavati iti|
1277:1012: asmādvacanāt jñāyate pañcaskandhā api paramārthato na santīti|
1277:1015: ya āha-sa eva jīvaḥ tadeva śarīram,
1277:1019: yeṣāmeṣā dṛṣṭiḥ na te macchrāvakā na brahmacāriṇa iti|
1277:1020: yat tasya jarāmaraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate tat prajñaptikhaṇḍanam|
1277:1028: uktañca sūtre-yo dharmo māyā sa mṛṣā|
1277:1036: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsamasadvai parayā dhiyā|| iti|
1277:1044: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na paramārthasanta iti|
1277:1047: na sambhavati skandhāḥ satyaṃ skandhābhāvo'pi satyamiti vaktum|
1277:1050: tathā yo'mugdhaḥ na sa paśyati skandhān|
1277:1054: yathāhānandaḥ-dharmānupādāya asmīti sidhyati yaduta rūpaskandhaṃ yāvadvijñānaskandhamupādāyeti|
1277:1059: api ca me āyuṣmantaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu asmīti adhigatam|
1277:1070: ato jñāyate pañcopādānaskandhā api śūnyā iti|
1277:1074: na tīrthikānāmiva rūpaprahāṇakāle jñāyate vastusat rūpaṃ,
1277:1076: yogī avaśyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyati nirodhadarśanāt animitte'vatarati|
1277:1077: ato jñāyate rūpādayo na paramārthasanta iti|
1277:1081: phenasūtre bhagavānāha-yadi puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍaṃ paśyet yoniśa upaparīkṣeta|
1277:1096: ato jñāyate skandhā na paramārthasanta iti|
1277:1112: yathāha bhagavān-yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivī [dhātu]ḥ ityādi|
1277:1113: ya imāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratilabhate sa vadati nāsti yatkiñciditi|
1277:1117: ato jñāyate sarve saṃskārā niruddhā bhavantīti|
1277:1118: yadi vastusantaḥ saṃskārāḥ tadā na syuḥ samyak prahāṇavimuktinirodhāḥ|
1277:1120: ato draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthataḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve'bhāvātmakāḥ saṃvṛtitastu santi saṃskārā iti||
1277:1137: śāstramāha-etāni trīṇi cittāni nirodhayato yogāvacarasya karmakleśā naiva punaḥ samudācaranti (pṛ)
1277:1140: yathā pradīpo dharmaśca sati niśraye vartate|
1277:1144: anāsravā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ sarvāṇi nimittāni tathā pradahati yathā na kiñcidavaśiṣyate|
1277:1146: nimittābhāvāt karmakleśānāṃ na punaḥ samudayo bhavati|
1277:1148: arhataḥ śūnyatājñānagatiṃgatasya asmimānarahitasya na punaḥ samudyanti|
1277:1151: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati|
1277:1152: asati ca tṛṣṇācitte na karmāṇi pacyante|
1277:1153: yathā anabhiṣyanditāyāṃ bhūmau bījaṃ na prarohati|
1277:1154: yogāvacarasyāsya sarvavijñānasthitiṣu sarvanimittanirodhe vijñānaṃ nirāśrayaṃ bhavati|
1277:1159: sa kleśābhāvāt vikalahetupratyayaḥ satsvapi karmasu nopapattiṃ vedayate|
1277:1161: kāyaṃ vedayata ityataḥ tasya karmāṇi vipākaṃ prayacchanti|
1277:1164: yathā adharmeṇa prabalamadhitiṣṭhati uttamarṇo nāvakāśaṃ labhate|
1277:1166: saṃsāre'vartamānasya santyapi karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti|
1277:1167: yathā baddhaṃ puruṣamanye janā yatheṣṭaṃ nindanti|
1277:1168: evaṃ kleśabaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmatāratamyavaśāt [kleśāḥ] vipākaṃ prayacchanti|
1277:1171: śūnyacaryāvihāritvādasya puruṣasya dharmeṣu svalakṣaṇa[saṃjñā] nāstītyataḥ karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti|
1277:1175: kleśavege kṣīṇe tu na tāni pravartante|
1277:1176: yathā cakraṃ gatisthamapi vegakṣayānna punaḥ pravartate|
1277:1178: yathā sutavatsalāyā mātuḥ raktaṃ stanyaṃ pariṇamate|
1277:1184: ataḥ sadapi prāktanaṃ karma na vipākaṃ prayacchati|
1277:1185: evamasya prāktanaṃ karma pratyutpanne kiñci[dvipāka] marpayati|
